metadata.title: CVE-2021-42917 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in Kodi xbmc up to 19.0, allows attackers tocause a denial of service due to improper length of values passed toistream.

criterions.comment: kodi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
